snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. finds himself in the midst of an increasingly tense standoff between Japan and China over Beijing’s creation of an air defense zone.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr delivers a carefully calibrated show of support for Japan, expressing deep concerns about China's move to control airspace over islands in the East China Sea; Biden stops short of a demand that Beijing reverse itself.

byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and JANE PERLEZ
byline.contributor: Mark Landler reported from Tokyo, and Jane Perlez from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. finds himself in the midst of an increasingly tense standoff between Japan and China over Beijing’s creation of an air defense zone.

headline.main: Biden Backs Ally Japan but Avoids Roiling China
headline.print_headline: Biden Backs Ally Japan But Avoids Roiling China
